Reticulum MeshChat is a simple mesh network communications application built on the Reticulum Network Stack. It allows users to send messages, files, and audio calls over various interfaces, including local networks, the internet, and LoRa radio, with a focus on secure communication and compatibility with other LXMF clients like Sideband and Nomadnet.

The VirusTotal CLI is a command-line tool that allows users to interact with the VirusTotal API. It provides functionalities such as retrieving information about files, URLs, domains, and IP addresses, as well as searching for threats, downloading files, and managing LiveHunt YARA rules.

AgentGym-RL is a framework for training LLM agents to perform multi-turn interactive decision-making using reinforcement learning. It provides diverse real-world scenarios and supports mainstream RL algorithms, aiming to improve the performance of LLM agents in complex tasks.
